data.title: Scientific Games
data.text:
Newsworthy

What's New at Scientific Games?

Keep up to date with the latest happenings at SG.

Games

From innovative scratch-off games to the latest concepts in draw games and incredible digital play experiences, our products drive performance. We put the fun in lottery play, all backed by our world-renowned analytics and insights.

Partner Services

The world’s top-performing lotteries trust our expert services to deliver quality, security and maximize returns to their beneficiary programs. Our partnerships include end-to-end management of lottery instant products, facilities and field services.

Technologies

Since 1973, we’ve been the innovators in our industry. From agile gaming systems to retail point-of-sale technology, digital and sports betting solutions, logistics and business intelligence platforms, we power lotteries around the world.

Sports Betting

Sports betting is a global phenomenon and a growing revenue source for lotteries. We offer the industry’s only retail and digital solution, trusted to power large-scale lottery retail networks.

Digital

Wherever players play, we’re there. That means innovative mobile and internet-based products that connect the retail and digital lottery experience. From second-chance play, loyalty programs, iLottery and sports betting, our product portfolio is focused on today, and tomorrow.

Environmental

Protecting our planet matters. We’re reducing our global impact on the environment.

Social

Our social advocacy and outreach create a positive impact in communities across the world.

Governance

We uphold the highest standards of integrity and transparency. Our ethical code of conduct guides everything we do.
